text: Maguse Lake is a lake in Kivalliq Region, Nunavut, Canada. It drains eastward into Hudson Bay by way of the long Maguse River. The area is frequented by caribou. A fifteen-year project building a road to Maguse Lake from Arviat was completed in 2010. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lakes of Kivalliq Region
title: Maguse Lake
